function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to private outdoor space for older adults","Impact":"Reduced evaluative wellbeing, independent predictor of poor health and longevity","Mitigation":"Provide access to private outdoor space, community gardens, or public green spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning, community engagement, landscaping","People":"Older adults","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inequality in access to green space and nature","Impact":"Contributes to health inequality within populations","Mitigation":"Ensure equal opportunities to interact with green space, promote community gardens, and provide public green spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning, community engagement, landscaping","People":"Population at large, especially those in urban areas","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of physical activity among older adults","Impact":"Reduced physical strength, fitness, flexibility, and psychological health benefits, increased risk of chronic diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage spending time in gardens, promote physical activity programs for older adults, provide age-friendly outdoor spaces","Technologies":"Gardening tools, community engagement, healthcare programs","People":"Older adults","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations"}]}
